name: Im Gonna Annihilate This Land
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhwa
content: Annihilate this land. Cleanse it of all impurities.&quotTo think I reincarnated as a bald skeleton who can&#039t even poo.&quotThe Skeleton king, the most wicked demonic king who the gods find bothersome.I was sealed after being scammed by the gods with a contract promising to turn me into a human.This is what they said.&quotSaint, have you awakened?&quotThis warmth and soft texture... A human body? And I&#039m a saint?&quotOh my, why is the baby saint in such a good mood today?&quot&quotSaint,
